snippet: Redistricting in Toledo is forcing a primary on Tuesday to determine whether Dennis J. Kucinich or Marcy Kaptur will keep a Congressional seat.
abstract: Rep Dennis J. Kucinich, a liberal icon who tried twice to win the Democratic nomination for president, is battling fellow progressive Marcy Kaptur in a forced Democratic primary after redistricting cut two Congressional seats out of Ohio, one of them his.
lead_paragraph: Redistricting in Toledo is forcing a primary on Tuesday to determine whether Dennis J. Kucinich or Marcy Kaptur will keep a Congressional seat.

headline.seo: For Dennis Kucinich, a Possible Last Hurrah
headline.main: A Possible Last Hurrah for a Liberal Lion of Ohio
headline.print_headline: A Possible Last Hurrah For a Liberal Lion of Ohio
